Two APIs have been implemented at:
- '/api/Vae/Img'
Arguments: List of float values (256D-embedding)
Returns: True if success (The image is currently written to backend. To do: return a path to the image)

- '/api/Vae/Ratings'.
Arguments: List of float values (256D-embedding)
Returns: List of user ratings


Test the APIs with the following curl command, replacing <Command> with either "Img" or "Ratings":

curl -X POST 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/VaeImg' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"z":[0.623232434363,0.47162336007,0.793778569541,0.012037135304,0.0817751094194,0.74769798028,0.0143097598677,0.865160938339,0.745225293969,0.267949399565,0.74712466613,0.209136278086,0.205868455009,0.374796330988,0.976418543127,0.143424636361,0.124673908187,0.935787694843,0.895125823145,0.54346706817,0.374200757946,0.668712387531,0.649196579532,0.925253469953,0.826120074447,0.971226348951,0.39153493226,0.977212352779,0.104477155975,0.232325433302,0.0496679287608,0.0802829571097,0.0474851730341,0.0498189152167,0.445993416514,0.0996818867127,0.409486878602,0.889381074233,0.596124052755,0.847269054396,0.249631800285,0.431856896492,0.663127574077,0.66290706742,0.678588336947,0.606236342395,0.411140294077,0.433165930909,0.163806731127,0.717544754009,0.053010346464,0.777156634506,0.327550119788,0.840727811279,0.921742505855,0.0648589261884,0.274500146341,0.542871646265,0.489505439192,0.0226624131457,0.611331387549,0.27670403846,0.474530119183,0.717720911978,0.0895095081071,0.279965040279,0.674339101009,0.643142712145,0.900377121398,0.185955998276,0.355820412893,0.68970138677,0.451131285973,0.168665968133,0.43848745646,0.522072918788,0.395483850357,0.496548937224,0.523626701975,0.00464841130883,0.0263548564579,0.34205334595,0.961900018624,0.986656229294,0.297075510297,0.31828211772,0.745454543277,0.274356731136,0.243100248311,0.753584409325,0.909254071712,0.387544491807,0.0143039674114,0.821367504232,0.0409932737789,0.870037498538,0.168109328514,0.933923839681,0.995821230238,0.335580105972,0.885389581653,0.173991653474,0.838787008219,0.875998697016,0.776195451853,0.827851510679,0.465348027436,0.270516098735,0.682698995135,0.0734279124315,0.255784660666,0.15299196303,0.676953890249,0.102058509926,0.364023338153,0.148612100313,0.315592784867,0.615687428289,0.0365914101822,0.172219815184,0.229432699114,0.578676485585,0.511067266814,0.927677491712,0.372966778228,0.640689455822,0.481851527511,0.500396917707,0.314863227218,0.74923003537,0.530250355613,0.223022332298,0.4814275
